alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Halifax County through 230 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Scotland Neck, or 9 miles north of Tarboro, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Halifax, Scotland Neck, Enfield, Weldon, South Weldon, Rosemary, Tillery, Roanoke Rapids Lake and Lake Gaston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
